entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • net9.0-ios-Release-arm64-NativeAOT_Release-OSX.13.Amd64.Iphone.Open leg failing without running tests #95875
  • [mono][wasi] add ilgen component tasks to wasi #95874
  • Failing test - `System.Threading.ThreadPools.Tests.ThreadPoolTests.ThreadPoolMinMaxThreadsEventTest` on Linux/arm64 #95873
  • [API Proposal]: System.Security.AccessControl.ServiceRights #95868
  • Directory.EnumerateFiles() => System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException #95867
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'ins != INS_invalid' #95866
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Adding Matrix operations to `System.Numerics.Tensors.TensorPrimitives` #95863
  • [tvos][test] mlaunch exited with 0, when test passed #95862
  • Normalized Spinwait on CPUs with P/E Cores #95849
  • JIT can reuse a comparison between two locals but fails to do so for two readonly fields #95844
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953.cmd #95843
  • Test failure Interop/COM/NETClients/Primitives/NETClientPrimitives/NETClientPrimitives.cmd #95842

Closed

  • Assert in FrozenObjectNode.EncodeData #95852
  • [wasm] Add WasmSingleFileBundle for browser-wasm projects too #95480
    9.0.0
  • HttpResponseMessage does not contain Content-Type and Content-Length headers in DelegatingHandler #95708
  • The input string 'System.ReadOnlySpan<Byte>[2]' was not in a correct format. #95044
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in Dictionary and Hashset on 9/24/2022 1:05:07 PM #76256
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.IPNetwork parse CIDR issue #95865
  • [wasm] Setting `maxParallelDownloads` sometimes has no effect #95491
    8.0.x
  • Does AOT plan to support EMIT in the future #95841
  • crossgen2 failure in VMR when using VMR stage 2 build scenario #95768
  • [NativeAOT] EventPipe current_thread_get_id performance #86828
    9.0.0
  • NTLM header authentication stopped remembering passwords #95848
  • Xamarin.Android 支持 System.IO.Ports #80352
    Future
  • TrimmerRootDescriptor is not able to preserve generic instantiations #95058
  • Issue with Delegate Pointers in .NET Core AOT using EasyHook #95624
  • Why use ‘call CORINFO_HELP_DBL2ULNG’ when double to ulong instead of vcvttsd2si #95846

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: clear loop iter info after rebuilding loops for opt repeat #95879
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix lifetime management of certificates with keys on macOS #95878
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Use 'compOpportunisticallyDependsOn' to determine if we can use ArmBase_Arm64_MultiplyLongAdd/MultiplyLongSub/MultiplyLongNeg intrinsics in lowering #95877
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ObjWriter in C# #95876
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert "Avoid a few array allocations with DefaultBinder (#93115)" #95872
    area-System.Reflection
  • JIT: Fix OSR DFS assert, and update entry BB for try regions #95871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser][fix] maxParallelDownloads #95870
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [browser] Minimal legacy support for Blazor renderBatch #95869
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] [tests] Disables tests on Apple mobile platforms #95861
    Servicing-consider, os-ios, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.x
  • Remove dotnet8 feeds from NuGet.config #95860
    needs-area-label
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix IsFixupPrecodeByASM and StubPrecode::IsStubPrecodeByASM #95859
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • JIT: Invalidate loop table after unrolling and dominators after MarkLocalVars #95854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95853
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Update the place where we assert about `align` presence while removing jump to next instr #95845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: Port loop alignment to new loop representation #95836
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm/wasi] Consolidate build targets #95775
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Move `StartupHooks` tests and remaining uses of PortableApp project to pre-built test assets #95761
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • [release/7.0-staging] [Android] Bump target SDK version for Android sample #95770
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.x
  • Fix FormatException error message when parsing invalid UTF8 inputs #95133
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Add explicit successor for BBJ_COND false branch #95773
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_AH_3A #95864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix duplicate subgraph clauses in flow graph dumping, minor loop cleanup #95850
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Recanonicalize entry BB in JitOptRepeat scenarios #95857
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update area-Tracing-coreclr and area-UWP owners #95766
    area-Meta
  • [browser][fix] maxParallelDownloads #95793
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Fix visibility error XUW1003 in tests: #95851
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use a more performant way to get the current thread id #95609
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [Mono][full-aot] Fix runtime invoke with delegate parameter #95824
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [tests] Disables tests on Apple mobile platforms #95757
    os-ios, area-System.Formats.Tar, 9.0.0
  • Make the intermediate output path OS-specific for CoreCLR/Mono #95797
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debug URL in lauchSettings.json in wasmbrowser template #95418
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.2
  • Add an additional length check to FrozenDictionary and FrozenSet #92546
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Enable ETW::GCLog::ForceGCForDiagnostics thread to be walked by the GC #95837
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Move some runtime code to a separate runtime.h/runtime.c… #95834
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Re-add Stack Overflow handling in NativeAOT with larger alternate stack #95808
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Added an optional HybridGlobalization run of libraries #95324
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser
  • Add runtime module address to SpecialDiagInfo block in createdump #95816
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] enable finalizer thread, run most tests in threadpool #95783
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Implement more APIs in new TypeBuilder, fix bugs found during testing #95753
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Add generic overloads to TensorPrimitives #94555
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Improve memory utilization in the case of continuous BGC #87715
    area-GC-coreclr
  • WIP: Testing iOS library mode with NativeAOT on CI #94999
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use multi-reg load/store for EncodeToUtf8 #95513
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [NO-MERGE][WIP] Testing Swift interop CI lines #95699
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation
  • workloads: Don't use wasm workload if PublishAot=true for nativeaot #95777
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 120.0.6099.71, windows: 120.0.6099.71 #95832
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT ARM64/SVE2: Add increment/decrement from predicate register instructions #94811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • use enclosing type cls handle for VN of static gc/non-gc helper #95840
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce CallConvSwift and special register types to represent the Swift ABI calling convention #95065
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Make some Span methods NonVersionable #94258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization fix localized DisplayName and LanguageName #95786
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Fix potential 'Floating Point Exception' with speculative execution #93517
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ReadAsStream/CopyTo should reset result/destination stream position #95827
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • JIT: Merge more stores/loads #95823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add CFG build for EventPipe enabled #95721
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix performance of System.Security. Cryptography.Tests #95310
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • [mono] Handle Assert failure when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is invoked with VoidDelegate type #79530
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Fix ReadOnlyDictionary and improve DebuggerAttributes #94581
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Console.Unix: fix ANSI colors over redirected standard output. #95654
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • The problem with memory cache threads has been fixed #95230
    area-Extensions-Caching, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Optimize Ascii.Equals for small values #93191
    area-System.Text.Encoding, tenet-performance, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • JIT: Remove loop-related VN quirks #95729
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • GT_STORE_BLK - do not call memset for blocks containg gc pointers on heap #95530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM][Question] import wasm modules #2457

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fold shadow stack save into the PI transition #2460
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix a corner-case bug with explicit tail calls #2458
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Brush up the building docs #2459
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • Add Stream boilerplate source-generator and attribute #2185
  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Integrate dotnet.js into ILCompiler.LLVM #2453
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Componentize repo layout #37439
  • error MSB3971: The reference assemblies for ".NETFramework,Version=v8.0" were not found. #37436
  • containerize.dll exits successfully after transient network failure #37435

Closed

  • [Broken Build]: Dotnet Publish is not idempotent and deletes required Content #37222
    Discussion
  • Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37400
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.JavaScript.Sdk project is not running as startup project if it resides inside of a solution folder #37024

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37433
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37432
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #37431
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #37430
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Merged

  • Fix stage 2 VMR source-build #37407
    source-build, untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37403
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37406
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37401
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37404
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Trusted roots: 2023-11 CTL #37405
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Wcwidth.Sources from 1.0.0 to 2.0.0 in /eng/dependabot #37032
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37408
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Remove Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate from prebuilt baseline #37384
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #33697] New standalone `info` command #36943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #37311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify and improve signature verification for workloads on Windows #36787
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Containers support was moved higher to enable creating image of CLI apps #37335
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 22.1.4 to 22.5.0 in /eng/dependabot #37031
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0055 triggered on no space after spread operator #71219
  • C# formatting rules should have a "do not enforce" option #71218
  • Use ToList for collection-exprs of a single spread #71217
  • Consider preferring AddRange over CopyTo for collection-expressions of List type #71216
  • Attribute to hide members in IntelliSense in same project or solution #71210
  • EditorBrowsable(Never) Not Hiding Members in Release DLL #71209
  • Compiler should provide good error message for alias qualified name in string interpolation #71203
  • Request for Clarification: What is the behavior of relative paths for the purposes of a #line directive? #71202
  • Warn about possibly unintended behavior in `x is not A or B` pattern matching expressions #71204

Closed

  • IDE0290 refactoring doesn't work in presense of `GeneratedRegex` #71149
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34411.88 #71211
  • EditorConfig Naming rule does not respect required_modifiers anymore #53539
    Backlog
  • The .NET SDK has newer analyzers with version '7.0.4' than what version '7.0.3' of 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers' package provides. Update or remove this package reference. #69436
    18.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix BuildHost in Source Build #71215
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: method type re-inference #71214
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Enable skipped tests (rename and extract methods) #71213
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't copy test results to helix upload root. #71212
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expose programmatic suppressions from SuppressionInfo #71207
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove TS impl of goto-def. The are entirely on LSP now #71123
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure both parts of partial methods are analyzed when requesting analyzer diagnostics for a single file #71201
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unnecessary check of trailing trivia for directives. #71185
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Make trivial Params Collections scenarios working end to end #71136
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Generate protected constructors in abstract types #71205
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add back request telemetry in CLaSP queue #71157
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate from prebuilt baseline #71175
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure the editorconfig for code-style analysis ("IDExxxx") rules is included #71173
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Collection expressions: align ConversionsBase.GetCollectionExpressionTypeKind() with spec #70975
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Split integration test build from test run #71166
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expression spread optimization #71195
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cache ROS constructed from arrays of constants (remaining types) #69820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Start local function analysis with captured variables marked "not null" #71148
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Create a Razor language server cohosted in Roslyn #70819
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run Spanish tests on CoreClr #67748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and… #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Use CPS for tests where saving documents needs to be reliable #70983
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update status/details on implicit indexers in object initializers #71164
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Loosen compiler restriction which was not required by the spec #71110
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Remove navigation helpers based on line+offset #71184
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Gladstone #71135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: tests for spreads of dynamic and non-generic IEnumerable collections #71158
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Add GetDeclaredSymbol overload for LocalFunctionStatementSyntax #71169
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce size of source constructor symbol #71178
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimize nullable value type constant comparison codegen #68069
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to use Razor library with "Blazor Web App project template" server+client .NET 8.0? #52752
  • Blazor QuickGrid getting selected row #52751
  • `dotnet user-secrets` uses windows file path on WSL Linux #52746
  • Blazor optional EmailAddress validation issue #52743
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #52742
  • Re-evaluate HTTP/3 defaults in .NET 9 #52741
    9.0-preview1
  • InteractiveAuto rendermode determined by from where the user was navigating #52740
  • [release/6.0] Flaky test RequestHeaderStringReuse_MultipleStreams_KnownHeaderClearedIfNotReused #52739
  • Output Caching Default Policy allows bypassing cache with any Authorization header even if there's no [Authorize] attribute #52738
  • Flaky test BlazorWebTemplate_IndividualAuth_LocalDb #52736
  • Corrupted Padding Bits Brotli Decode Blazor Azure Static Web App #52735
  • Flaky test CheckStdoutWithLargeWrites_TestSink #52734
  • Can't read response body neither in a custom logging middleware nor in built-in http logger via IHttpLoggingInterceptor. #52731
  • Blazor Server UploadFile Throws "System.InvalidOperationException: Reading is not allowed after reader was completed." #52723
    Backlog
  • blazor WebAssembly does not run normally #52721
  • Authentication used on every path even without UseAuthentication() since .NET 8 #52720
  • The blazer auto rendering mode did not work as expected. #52719
  • Perf regression: mapaction #52717
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #52716
  • Models used in Minimal API Endpoint Metadata do not respect the Swashbuckle Annotations Attributes #52713

Closed

  • Unskip MsQuic-dependent Tests on Debian12 When Available #46616
    Test failures
  • Allow to re-connect even in case of session has already deleted on server (create a new one) #52733
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props does not get imported correctly #52637
  • DOMException: Failed to execute 'setStartBefore' on 'Range': the given Node has no parent. #52126
    8.0.x
  • In the Blazor Web App Template, a policy works using the attribute Authorize for the page but not for the AuthorizeView inside the page when the page is in the client project #52199
  • blazor ignoring UsePathBase middleware #52198
  • [Linux] After creating the Blazor Web App on Visual Studio Code, running it and clicking "Counters/Weather/Home" in the browser list on the left, cannot navigate to the target page. #51979
  • Stop aspnetcore application running in IIS #52451
  • OIDC NonceCookie/CorrelationCookie not accepted in HTTP environment #52617
    9.0-preview1
  • "Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.DataAnnotations.Validation" is still in preview #52685
  • Out of the box .net 8 blazor project fails when navigating directly to a route that load a page with injected dependencies. #52614
  • [Static web assets] Support watch in static web assets #40372
    Planning: WebUI
  • Add data-nosnippet in blazor-error-ui #50840
    Backlog
  • `Blazor` JavaScript object and related type definitions should be available (`@types/blazor`, `@types/dotnet`) #52629
  • .NET 8.0 - Visual Studio - Confusion #52548
  • AuthenticationScheme Issue - No DefaultChallengeScheme Found #52657
  • Catch-all route at the root level doesn't work any more in .NET 8 #52708
  • net8 blazor interactive modes are so flaky to work with #51837
    Backlog
  • Occasional crash in IIS after compile #44546
    .NET 8 Planning
  • What Should We Expect the First Load of InteractivityWasm #52406
  • JsonSourceGenerationOptions does not Integrate with ASP. NET Core correctly #52642
  • NETSDK1082 : 'browser-wasm' #52384
  • Submit enhanced forms programatically #52479

PullRequests

Created

  • #52067 input number range type #52747
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Fix misdetection of component comments #52744
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • Retry BlazorWebTemplate_IndividualAuth_LocalDb #52737
    area-infrastructure
  • [blazor][wasm] Remove legacy interop #52732
    area-blazor, arch-wasm, .NET 9 Planning
  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread (Net9) #52724
    area-blazor, arch-wasm, .NET 8 Planning
  • Add s390x support to the runtimearchitecture list #52722
    community-contribution, area-hosting, area-networking
  • Add ForgotPasswordRequest to STJ source generation context #52714
    area-identity, community-contribution

Merged

  • Unskip HelixPlatform_QuicListenerIsSupported on debian #52745
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Update devcontainer Dockerfile #52681
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Implement IDirectoryContents on ManifestDirectoryInfo #50586
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Fix `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView.props` not getting packed correctly #52638
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • [Blazor] Fix misdetection of component comments #52647
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • Update SDK to 23608.3 #52669
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Use SHA256 for RPM digest #52664
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix XML documentation of CorrelationCookie and NonceCookie #52715
    community-contribution, area-security, 9.0-preview1
  • Reduce allocations in MakeArrayFormatter #52675
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • Remove superfluous subtraction #52635
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Set IExceptionHandlerFeature on DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware #52688
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Add null check for connectionId #52672
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Fix metrics duration and http.route tag with exception handling #52652
    area-hosting
  • Add ShortCircuitAttribute #52571
    community-contribution, area-middleware

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TapGestureRecognizer not working with TableView #19348
  • Local Notifications in .NET MAUI Essentials custom sound is not working #19346
  • Re-enable semantic tests on iOS #19345
    .NET 8 SR2
  • [Testing] iOS compatibility tests currently failing on main #19343
  • Button multitrigger setter hangs Maui app #19342
  • Embedding an iOS ContentView or Layout does not get a size #19340
    Backlog
  • Restore failures - change version, delete bin/obj, reload #19339
  • [iOS] Border.Shadow hide the collectionView Header #19338
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compiled model and SQLite in EF Core error #32592
  • Compiled model - problem with large models #32591
  • "entityframeworkcore.design" domain is taken and redirect to NSFW contents #32590
  • After update to .net 8: Error System.InvalidOperationException : The property 'Id' is part of a key and so cannot be modified or marked as modified. To change the principal of an existing entity with an identifying foreign key, first delete the dependent and invoke 'SaveChanges', and then associate the dependent with the new principal. #32588
  • Custom value converter on primitive collections #32587
  • The current provider doesn't have a store type mapping for properties of type 'DateIndex'. #32583

Closed

  • Inconsistent behavior related to relationship cycle #32422
    8.0.x
  • Create migration bundle without requiring connection to DB #32485
  • Unable to use BulkInsert/BulkDelete #32584
  • Check commands[i] is not null for avoid NRE on Dispose command #22921
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Validate scaffolding migration file names #32589

Merged

  • Improve the relationship cycle breaking logic to detect cycles even when not starting on one. #32573
  • Revert the nongeneric DbContextOptions registration #32579
    auto-merge
  • Ensure connection and commands can be disposed in either order #32581
  • Stop re-using the same connection when running test queries in parallel #32580

Updated

  • Generate more information when failing to load EntityTypeConfiguration types #32577
  • [release/8.0] Ensure that, by convention, dependent properties have the same element type as principal properties #32582
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Installer is failing to synchronize in sourcebuild #17682
  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-enable smoke tests that rely on templates #17944
  • Generate default license baseline file in test #17943

Merged

  • Always run vmr-scan #17945
  • Fix attribute type checking and use null-conditional operator #17902
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #17936
  • Don't run crossgen in cross-arch VMR vertical builds #17937
